name: Sylvetica
comment:
>>44267763
You've had about all you can stand of this nonsense.

And yeah, you guess the screaming is starting to get to you.

You draw your sword, lunging forward at the nearest doll and swinging horizontally in what little space the others around you afford youâ€”and feel the gazes of the others focusing in on you as your blade bites into her midsection. Flames lick at the wound, and broken marble dust bursts into the dry air.

But it doesn't feel quite like cutting into a Crawler, or even the Obsidian Pegasus. Buried a full width in her side, your sword grinds to a halt, and she stumbles, reaching down and wrapping her spindly fingers around the blade, staring at you through painted eyelids.

> Twist and push. Bisect her.
> Nope! Sorry about that, ma'am. Was just practicing my swings.
> Try and yell something over the noise. (Write-in.)
